src:
東京円１９銭安、１ドル＝１０８円９７～９８銭

06 Nov 2019, 09:08

　６日の東京外国為替市場の円相場は午後５時、前日（午後５時）比１９銭円安・ドル高の１ドル＝１０８円９７～９８銭で大方の取引を終えた。
　対ユーロでは同４０銭円高・ユーロ安の１ユーロ＝１２０円７３～７７銭で大方の取引を終えた。
text:
Tokyo yen 19 yen depreciation, 1 dollar = 108 yen 97-98 yen

06 Nov 2019, 09:08

On the 6th, the yen exchange rate on the Tokyo foreign exchange market ended at 5:00 pm, most transactions ended with a depreciation of 19 yen against the previous day (5 pm) and a dollar increase of 108 yen 97-98 yen.
In the euro, most transactions were closed at the same 40 yen appreciation and euro depreciation, 1 euro = 120 yen 73-77 yen.
